commits.subject: Fix UI styling issues
commits.body:
- Add dark background to input fields for better text readability
- Make black overlay fully opaque (remove transparency)
- Align visualization column to top instead of center

commits.subject: Implement dark theme design
commits.body:
Dark theme updates:
- Convert all color variables to dark palette
- Background: Deep slate (#0f172a)
- Surface: Dark slate (#1e293b, #334155)
- Text: Light slate (#f1f5f9, #94a3b8)
- Primary: Vibrant purple gradient (#7c3aed → #a855f7)
- Update all shadows for better visibility on dark backgrounds
- Adjust channel group gradients for dark mode
- Update content area gradient
- Enhance input focus states with purple glow
- Update reset button styling for dark theme
- Improve range slider contrast

commits.subject: Merge pull request #3 from illuminAI-select/claude/mobile-improvements-611Uu
commits.body: Improve mobile responsiveness with enhanced touch targets

commits.subject: Improve mobile responsiveness with enhanced touch targets
commits.body:
Mobile improvements:
- Add comprehensive mobile styles for screens ≤800px
- Implement 44px minimum touch targets for all interactive elements
- Set font-size: 16px on inputs to prevent iOS zoom
- Increase slider thumb size to 24px for easier touch
- Increase checkbox touch area to 44x44px
- Improve button touch targets (min 48px height)
- Switch preset buttons to 2-column layout on mobile
- Adjust spacing and padding for mobile screens
- Add extra small device support (≤480px)
- Optimize visualization container for mobile viewports
- Remove border-right on mobile sidebar, add border-bottom
- Allow body height to be auto on mobile for better scrolling

commits.subject: Merge pull request #2 from illuminAI-select/claude/add-claude-md-611Uu
commits.body: Modernize UI with contemporary design system

commits.subject: Modernize UI with contemporary design system
commits.body:
Design improvements:
- Add CSS custom properties for consistent theming
- Implement purple gradient color scheme (#667eea → #764ba2)
- Use modern system font stack
- Add card-based design with subtle shadows and hover effects
- Create gradient text headings
- Implement custom-styled range sliders with gradient thumbs
- Add focus states with glow effects
- Enhance buttons with lift animations
- Add gradient background to content area
- Improve spacing, typography, and visual hierarchy
- Smooth transitions with cubic-bezier easing

commits.subject: Add comprehensive claude.md documentation
commits.body:
- Document project overview and purpose
- Describe technology stack and architecture
- Explain all features and interactive controls
- Detail code organization and structure
- Include development considerations and use cases
